org.araneaframework.jsp.util
Class AutomaticFormElementUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.jsp.util.AutomaticFormElementUtil

public class AutomaticFormElementUtil
extends Object

Utility class for setting FormElement properties that are needed for rendering them in Aranea JSP with AutomaticTagFormElementTag.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
AutomaticTagFormElementTag, FormElementViewSelector, TagInfo, TagAttr

Field Summary
static Map CONTROLS_TO_DISPLAY_TAGS
          Contains the display tags
static Map CONTROLS_TO_EDITABLE_TAGS
          Contains the editable (input) tags
 
Method Summary
static void setFormElementDefaultDisplayTag(FormElement element)
          Assigns the default editable (aka input) tags to given form element.
static void setFormElementDefaultDisplayTags(FormWidget form)
          Assigns the default display (aka read-only) tags to all of the elements of the form.
static void setFormElementDefaultEditableTag(FormElement element)
          Assigns the default editable (aka input) tags to given form element.

Method Detail

setFormElementViewSelector

public static void setFormElementViewSelector(FormElement formElement,
                                              FormElementViewSelector viewSelector)
Assigns a FormElementViewSelector viewSelector to the specified FormElement.

Parameters:
formElement - The form element that will get the view (tag) selector.
viewSelector - The view (tag) selector that will be used on rendering.

setFormElementViewSelector

public static void setFormElementViewSelector(FormWidget form,
                                              String formElementId,
                                              FormElementViewSelector viewSelector)
Assigns a FormElementViewSelector viewSelector to the FormElement that belongs to form and has an ID formElementId.

Parameters:
form - The form with the given element.
formElementId - The ID of the form element that will get the view (tag) selector.
viewSelector - The view (tag) selector that will be used on rendering.

setFormElementTag

public static void setFormElementTag(FormElement formElement,
                                     String tagName,
                                     Map tagAttributes)
Associates FormElement with a JSP tag that AutomaticTagFormElementTag will use for actual rendering of the FormElement.

Parameters:
formElement - The form element that will get the view (tag) selector.
tagName - name of the tag, without any namespace
tagAttributes - Map <attributeName, attributeValue>

setFormElementTag

public static void setFormElementTag(FormWidget form,
                                     String formElementId,
                                     String tagName,
                                     Map tagAttributes)
Assigns a tag to the specified element.

Parameters:
form - parent form or composite element.
formElementId - id of the simple element.
tagName - name of the tag that will be used to render the element.
tagAttributes - tag custom attributes.

setFormElementTag

public static void setFormElementTag(FormElement formElement,
                                     String tagName)
Assigns an attributeless tag to the specified FormElement.

Parameters:
formElement - id of the simple element.
tagName - name of the tag that will be used to render the element, without any namespace.

setFormElementTag

public static void setFormElementTag(FormWidget form,
                                     String formElementId,
                                     String tagName)
Assigns an attributeless tag to the specified to the FormElement that belongs to form and has id formElementId.

Parameters:
form - parent form or composite element.
formElementId - id of the simple element.
tagName - name of the tag that will be used to render the element, without any namespace.

setFormElementTag

public static void setFormElementTag(FormElement formElement,
                                     String tagName,
                                     TagAttr[] attributePairs)
Assigns specified tag and attributes to the FormElement.

Parameters:
formElement - The form element that will start to use the automatic tag.
tagName - name of the tag that will be used to render the element, without any namespace
attributePairs - tag attributes.

setFormElementTag

public static void setFormElementTag(FormWidget form,
                                     String formElementId,
                                     String tagName,
                                     TagAttr[] attributePairs)
Assigns tag with specified attributes to the specified to the FormElement that belongs to form and has id formElementId.

Parameters:
form - parent FormWidget
formElementId - id of the form element
tagName - name of the tag that will be used to render the element, without any namespace
attributePairs - tag attributes.

setFormElementDefaultEditableTag

public static void setFormElementDefaultEditableTag(FormElement element)
Assigns the default editable (aka input) tags to given form element.

Parameters:
element - The form element that will be editable.
Since:
1.0.7

setFormElementDefaultDisplayTag

public static void setFormElementDefaultDisplayTag(FormElement element)
Assigns the default editable (aka input) tags to given form element.

Parameters:
element - The form element that will be just viewable.
Since:
1.0.7

setFormElementDefaultEditableTags

public static void setFormElementDefaultEditableTags(FormWidget form)
Assigns the default editable (aka input) tags to all of the elements of the form.

Parameters:
form - parent form or composite element.

setFormElementDefaultDisplayTags

public static void setFormElementDefaultDisplayTags(FormWidget form)
Assigns the default display (aka read-only) tags to all of the elements of the form.

Parameters:
form - parent form or composite element.
